mapper.update: UPDATE reminder SET groupId = #{groupId} WHERE id = ( SELECT subquery.id FROM (SELECT id FROM reminder ORDER BY id LIMIT 1 OFFSET ${id-1}) AS subquery )
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM reminder WHERE id = ( SELECT subquery.id FROM (SELECT id FROM reminder ORDER BY id LIMIT 1 OFFSET ${id-1}) AS subquery )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM reminder WHERE id = ( SELECT id FROM reminder ORDER BY id LIMIT 1 OFFSET ${id-1} )
